definition.name: Build and push Docker images
definition.description: Build and push Docker images with Buildx
definition.author: docker

inputs.name: add-hosts
inputs.description: List of a customs host-to-IP mapping (e.g., docker:10.180.0.1)

inputs.name: allow
inputs.description: List of extra privileged entitlement (e.g., network.host,security.insecure)

inputs.name: attests
inputs.description: List of attestation parameters (e.g., type=sbom,generator=image)

inputs.name: build-args
inputs.description: List of build-time variables

inputs.name: build-contexts
inputs.description: List of additional build contexts (e.g., name=path)

inputs.name: builder
inputs.description: Builder instance

inputs.name: cache-from
inputs.description: List of external cache sources for buildx (e.g., user/app:cache, type=local,src=path/to/dir)

inputs.name: cache-to
inputs.description: List of cache export destinations for buildx (e.g., user/app:cache, type=local,dest=path/to/dir)

inputs.name: cgroup-parent
inputs.description: Optional parent cgroup for the container used in the build

inputs.name: context
inputs.description: Build's context is the set of files located in the specified PATH or URL

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: Path to the Dockerfile

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: List of metadata for an image

inputs.name: load
inputs.description: Load is a shorthand for --output=type=docker

inputs.name: network
inputs.description: Set the networking mode for the RUN instructions during build

inputs.name: no-cache
inputs.description: Do not use cache when building the image

inputs.name: no-cache-filters
inputs.description: Do not cache specified stages

inputs.name: outputs
inputs.description: List of output destinations (format: type=local,dest=path)

inputs.name: platforms
inputs.description: List of target platforms for build

inputs.name: provenance
inputs.description: Generate provenance attestation for the build (shorthand for --attest=type=provenance)

inputs.name: pull
inputs.description: Always attempt to pull all referenced images

inputs.name: push
inputs.description: Push is a shorthand for --output=type=registry

inputs.name: insecure
inputs.description: insecure

inputs.name: sbom
inputs.description: Generate SBOM attestation for the build (shorthand for --attest=type=sbom)

inputs.name: secrets
inputs.description: List of secrets to expose to the build (e.g., key=string, GIT_AUTH_TOKEN=mytoken)

inputs.name: secret-files
inputs.description: List of secret files to expose to the build (e.g., key=filename, MY_SECRET=./secret.txt)

inputs.name: shm-size
inputs.description: Size of /dev/shm (e.g., 2g)

inputs.name: ssh
inputs.description: List of SSH agent socket or keys to expose to the build

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: List of tags

inputs.name: target
inputs.description: Sets the target stage to build

inputs.name: ulimit
inputs.description: Ulimit options (e.g., nofile=1024:1024)

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: GitHub Token used to authenticate against a repository for Git context
